verses.verse: God<WH430> is our refuge<WH4268> and strength<WH5797>, a very<WH3966> present<WH4672> help<WH5833> in trouble<WH6869>.
Therefore will not we fear<WH3372>, though the earth<WH776> be removed<WH4171>, and though the mountains<WH2022> be carried<WH4131> into the middle<WH3820> of the sea<WH3220>;
Though the waters<WH4325> there roar<WH1993> and be troubled<WH2560>, though the mountains<WH2022> shake<WH7493> with the swelling<WH1346> there<WH5542>. Selah.
There is a river<WH5104>, the streams<WH6388> of which shall make glad<WH8055> the city<WH5892> of God<WH430>, the holy<WH6918> place of the tabernacles<WH4908> of the most High<WH5945>.
God<WH430> is in the middle<WH7130> of her<WH4131>; she shall not be moved: God<WH430> shall help<WH5826> her<WH6437>, and that right early<WH1242>.
The heathen<WH1471> raged<WH1993>, the kingdoms<WH4467> were moved<WH4131>: he uttered<WH5414> his voice<WH6963>, the earth<WH776> melted<WH4127>.
The Lord<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> is with us<WH430>; the God of Jacob<WH3290> is our refuge<WH4869>. Selah<WH5542>.
Come<WH3212>, behold<WH2372> the works<WH4659> of the Lord<WH3068>, what desolations<WH8047> he has made<WH7760> in the earth<WH776>.

He makes wars<WH4421> to cease<WH7673> unto the end<WH7097> of the earth<WH776>; he breaks<WH7665> the bow<WH7198>, and cuts<WH7112> the spear<WH2595> in sunder<WH7112>; he burns<WH8313> the chariot<WH5699> in the fire<WH784>.
Be still<WH7503>, and know<WH3045> that I am God<WH430>: I will be exalted<WH7311> among the heathen<WH1471>, I will be exalted<WH7311> in the earth<WH776>.
The Lord<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> is with us<WH430>; the God of Jacob<WH3290> is our refuge<WH4869>. Selah<WH5542>.
